intro: Thlaspi psychine, commonly known as the yellow rocket, is a flowering plant belonging to the Brassicaceae family. It is characterized by its basal rosette of dark green, hairy leaves and bright yellow flowers that bloom in early spring. The plant typically grows in moist, disturbed soils and is often found in meadows, roadsides, and waste areas. Thlaspi psychine is an annual or biennial herb that produces small, capsule-like fruits containing numerous seeds. It plays a role in soil stabilization and provides nectar for early pollinators.
